description: Updates the information specified for an on-call rotation.

parameters.name: RotationId
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the rotation to update.

parameters.name: ContactIds
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the contacts to include in the updated rotation. The order in which you list the contacts is their shift order in the rotation schedule. (string) ---

parameters.name: TimeZoneId
parameters.description: The time zone to base the updated rotation's activity on, in Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) format. For example: 'America/Los_Angeles', 'UTC', or 'Asia/Seoul'. For more information, see the Time Zone Database on the IANA website.

parameters.name: Recurrence
parameters.description: Information about how long the updated rotation lasts before restarting at the beginning of the shift order. MonthlySettings (list) --- Information about on-call rotations that recur monthly. (dict) --- Information about on-call rotations that recur monthly. The day of the month when monthly recurring on-call rotations begin. The time of day when a monthly recurring on-call shift rotation begins. The hour when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends. The minute when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends. WeeklySettings (list) --- Information about on-call rotations that recur weekly. (dict) --- Information about rotations that recur weekly. The day of the week when weekly recurring on-call shift rotations begins. The time of day when a weekly recurring on-call shift rotation begins. DailySettings (list) --- Information about on-call rotations that recur daily. (dict) --- Details about when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends. The number of contacts, or shift team members designated to be on call concurrently during a shift. For example, in an on-call schedule containing ten contacts, a value of 2 designates that two of them are on call at any given time. ShiftCoverages (dict) --- Information about the days of the week included in on-call rotation coverage. (string) --- (list) --- (dict) --- Information about when an on-call shift begins and ends. Start (dict) --- Information about when the on-call rotation shift begins. End (dict) --- Information about when the on-call rotation shift ends. The number of days, weeks, or months a single rotation lasts.

nested_params.name: MonthlySettings
nested_params.description: Information about on-call rotations that recur monthly.

nested_params.name: DayOfMonth
nested_params.description: The day of the month when monthly recurring on-call rotations begin.

nested_params.name: HandOffTime
nested_params.description: The time of day when a monthly recurring on-call shift rotation begins.

nested_params.name: HourOfDay
nested_params.description: The hour when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_params.name: MinuteOfHour
nested_params.description: The minute when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_params.name: WeeklySettings
nested_params.description: Information about on-call rotations that recur weekly.

nested_params.name: DayOfWeek
nested_params.description: The day of the week when weekly recurring on-call shift rotations begins.

nested_params.name: HandOffTime
nested_params.description: The time of day when a weekly recurring on-call shift rotation begins.

nested_params.name: HourOfDay
nested_params.description: The hour when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_params.name: MinuteOfHour
nested_params.description: The minute when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_params.name: DailySettings
nested_params.description: Information about on-call rotations that recur daily.

nested_params.name: HourOfDay
nested_params.description: The hour when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_params.name: MinuteOfHour
nested_params.description: The minute when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_params.name: NumberOfOnCalls
nested_params.description: The number of contacts, or shift team members designated to be on call concurrently during a shift. For example, in an on-call schedule containing ten contacts, a value of 2 designates that two of them are on call at any given time.

nested_params.name: ShiftCoverages
nested_params.description: Information about the days of the week included in on-call rotation coverage.

nested_params.name: Start
nested_params.description: Information about when the on-call rotation shift begins.

nested_params.name: HourOfDay
nested_params.description: The hour when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_params.name: MinuteOfHour
nested_params.description: The minute when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_params.name: End
nested_params.description: Information about when the on-call rotation shift ends.

nested_params.name: HourOfDay
nested_params.description: The hour when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_params.name: MinuteOfHour
nested_params.description: The minute when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_params.name: RecurrenceMultiplier
nested_params.description: The number of days, weeks, or months a single rotation lasts.
